questions.name: Ford client want to design an application for its Auto repair process where the customer should get a mail whenever there is an update on the repair case. ONce the application is live, Mr Carlo comes to the Ford Dealership to repair his car. Which of the following statements are true

options.answer: Mr Carlo would be a client Party
Mr Carlo would be a customer Party
Ford dealership would be a client Party
Ford dealership would be dealer party

questions.name: Ford client want to design an application for its Auto repair process where the customer should get a mail whenever there is an update on the repair case. ONce the application is live, Mr Carlo comes to the Ford Dealership to repair his car. Which of the following statements are true

options.answer: Mr Carlo`s information should be captured in this repair case as a party
Mr Carlo`s information should be captured in this repair case as a customer party
Mr Carlo`s information should be captured in this repair case as a dealer party
Ford Dealership`s information should be captured in this repair case as a party too

questions.name: What parties are defaulted when you go to settings tab of a case type rule?

For the Automobile repair application of Ford, ford dealership is taking an automobile repair case of Mr Brown. Mr Brown calls the Ford Dealership (and talked with Miss Cox ) to book an appointment. Which of the following statements are true?

options.answer: Mr Brown would be Customer Party
Mr Brown would be Owner Party
Miss Cox would be interested Party

questions.name: When a Pega developer adds or modifes the Party in Settings tab of Case type rule, which pega rule is modified.
What information is relevant when you create a party?

options.answer: Case Participant is an individual or an organization.
Does the party work on the case or interested on the status updates
Does the Party has a very long name
Does the party belongs to a particular timezone

questions.name: What is not a valid standard Pega Party class.
What is not a valid standard Pega Party class.
What is not a valid standard Pega Party class.

For the Car repair case, Miss Tori is assigned as a case worker. However,she needs some help so she is assisted with a Case manager. As a developer you wanted to have two work parties for case, one is Owner and the other is Manager. Which of the following statements are true

options.answer: Owner Party should be of Data-Party-Operator class
Manager Party should be of Data-Party-Operator class
Owner Party should be of Data-Party-Person class
Manager Party should be of Data-Party-Person class

questions.name: For the Car repair case, Miss Tori took a call for appointment from Mr Brown to repaid Mr Brown`s car. Which of the following statements are true

options.answer: Mr Brown would be Customer Party
Miss Tori would be of Owner Party
Customer party would be of Data-Party-Person class
Owner party would be of Data-Party-Person class

questions.name: Ford company has a repair application. Ford wants to have social wing for Helpage.org which is a non-profit organization. There should be a contract case involved both the parties as well as Govt to enforce the contract. Which statements are correct?

options.answer: Govt would be a party of Data-Party-Gov class
Ford would be a party of Data-Party-Com class
Helpage would be a party of Data-Party-Org class

questions.name: What are the facts to evaluate before defining a party?

options.answer: Are multiple instances of the party associated with the case? For example, does the case involve one customer or several customers?
Is the information available when the case is created? Or does the information become available during case processing?
How will you obtain the information to populate the party details? Do you expect the user to enter this information? Can you copy the information from session information or case data?
What information do you need to know about the party? For example, do you only need the name and email address, or do you also need to know their marital status?

questions.name: For a banking application, CSR opens a new account for a customer. How as a pega developer you should design this case to have customer as a party?

options.answer: When creating a case, select the Display on creation option for the party in the Case Designer Parties configuration section
Use addWorkObjectParty API activity just after initializing the case.

questions.name: For a banking application, CSR opens a new account for a customer. How as a pega developer you should design this case to have CSR as a party?

options.answer: When creating a case, select the Display on creation option for the party in the Case Designer Parties configuration section
Use addWorkObjectParty API activity while starting the case.

questions.name: For a banking application, CSR opens a new account for a customer. Opening a new bank account case, have few child cases under it. How as a pega developer you should design the child cases to have CSR as a party?

options.answer: When creating a case, select the Display on creation option for the party in the Case Designer Parties configuration section
Use addWorkObjectParty API activity while starting the case.

questions.name: Can we have a Lawyer party to a case by just modifying the role field?
Can we have more than one role having same role name defined for a case?
How to configure which party role would be of which class like Data-Party-Com or data-Party-Gov etc
When a Ford Dealership CSR creates a Repair case, as a pega developer you want to copy the operator information to Owner Party. How to do this in a best possible way?

options.answer: Configure a Data transform in the Case Designer >> Settings to copy the information from OperatorID page
Run addWorkObjectParty api as part of the process of case type

questions.name: You are initializing a Party of Data-Party-Person but want to use a data transform of Data-Party-Operator class. Will it be possible?
Select the Display on creation check box to prompt users to add this work party every time a case is created.

Select the Required check box to indicate that this work party must be present in every new case. Selecting this check box adds required fields to the work item entry form to collect information about the party.
Select the Allow multiple check box to allow more than one instance of your work party to participate in a case.

You can also define or edit a work party directly on the work party rule. To do so, go to the Application Explorer, expand the appropriate case type, and select Process > Work Parties > pyCaseManagementDefault.
Which standard flow shape represents an automated system action?

A home loan company has home appraisal offices in various regions. Each office has its own work queue. Company policy requires that home appraisals are assigned to offices based on the home's location. For example, appraisals for homes located in Boston are assigned to the New England office work queue. Which routing approach would you choose to support this requirement?

options.answer: Route the assignment based on an appraiser role.
Route the assignment based on appraiser skills.
It is not possible to support this requirement. The router must define a specific work queue.
Route the assignment to the correct work queue based on a decision rule.

questions.name: A process is having three assignments to collect the data which need to be Populated by three particular user, Can we route the case to the appropriate party based on the assignment?
After submitting the expense report, the expense case should be reviewed by some reviewer. As a pega developer, you should assign the review assignment to a particular reviewer or to a work queue?

A worklist is a list of all open assignments, ordered by urgency, for a specific user. For example, an assignment that requires a human resources manager to approve employee time off requests routes to the human resources manager's worklist.
Managers can access and assign work to the worklists of users who report to the managers.
A work queue is a list of all open assignments, ordered by urgency, for a group of users.
Assignments stay in the work queue until a user associated with the work queue selects an assignment, or a manager sends an assignment in the work queue to a specific user.
A user accesses assignments from a ___________. Users in a work group access assignments from a _________________.
Which option of Routing not available in Pega Express
Which option of Routing not available in Pega Express
Based on some condition , the assignment need to be routed to a worklist or work queue. Which of the following option should be selected
If the loan amount is more than 100K Usd, it should be assigned to the Senior manager or else to Manager. Use option should be used for routing
As a pega developer, you want to implement a routing where an assignemnt should be routed to a skilled case worker. Which option should you choose?
As a pega developer, you want to implement a routing where an assignemnt should be routed to a skilled case worker having a French language skill more than 5. Which option should you choose?

Single level approval routing (You can assign an approval task to a specific user, work queue, or the reporting manager of the user working on the case) can be suitably achieved by using which option.
Cascading approval routing can be achieved by Cascading approval routin or the outcome of decision rule (matrix routing).

To route assignments based on a reporting structure in a cascading approval process: Approval Smart Shape >> General >> Approval Flow Type (Cascading) >> Approval based on (Reporting structure)>> Approval to be completed by(Reporting manager) >> Approval level (one or All or custom)
Cascading approval can have following options, Please select the appropriate ones.

options.answer: One	The manager specified in the Approval to be completed by field must approve the case.
All	The entire reporting structure, starting with the manager specified in the Approval to be completed by field, must approve the case.
Custom	A variable number of reviewers must approve the case, based on a list of when conditions.
Business logic	A variable number of reviewers must approve the case, based on a list of when conditions.

questions.name: You have four managers in your reporting structure, however you want only three to approve to if the loan amount is 50000 USD. What should be the when condition evaluation field and levels of approvals.
Cascading approval based on authority matrix calls which type of rule to get the routing to value.
Can we configure a page list to get the list of reviewers for cascading approval under Authority matrix?

An expense report process requires the assignment for travel expenses to be routed to a specific auditor. The auditor is also a member of an auditing work group. How would you route the assignment so that the user receives it?

An insurance company provides personal property insurance. Jewelry is categorized as a special type of personal property. Requests for jewelry coverage require that a user managing the request is trained to appraise jewelry. The requirement is to route assignments for jewelry appraisals to users who have this skill. Which one of the following routing approaches would you use?

options.answer: Route requests to a reporting manager who assigns the request to an available user to ensure fast processing.
Route requests to a work group that uses skill rating parameters for work group members.
Route requests to a decision table which routes the request to a work group in a location where there are users who have appraisal skills.
Route directly to a user who is a member of work group that uses skill rating parameters.
